ygData.subject: Re: To Kilas about advanced smith books
ygData.msgSnippet: These books in Kelethin.... They are the advanced books?  I m looking for something more than the basic book (a good one but only basic) and something more
ygData.messageBody:
These books in Kelethin.... They are the advanced books? I'm looking for
something more than the basic book (a good one but only basic) and something
more than our weapons and armor guide (which is really only banded mail
recipe) I reside in Neriak mostly. Thanks.

Shifting many to the dark side,

Ebonsith the Lich of E'ci

__________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 3
> Date: Fri, 28 May 1999 07:09:28 EDT
> From: SmallBoy99@...
> Subject: Re: Where is advanced smithing books
>
> where are you? the only place i know of is in kelethin, up the main lift,
> there's a trunk, 2 merchants on each side, the left one has both books.
>
> Kilas
> Xegony Server
